result.eng: All they wanted was to take revenge.
result.ga: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amach
result.orig: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amach
result.html: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amachAll they wanted was to take revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ ar a intinn aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċAll they wanted was to take revenge.

result.eng: He wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.
result.ga: Theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na hEorpa
result.orig: Theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na hEorpa
result.html: Theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na hEorpaHe wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.
result.ponchtml: Ṫeastaiġ uaiḋ dul i dtaiṫí ar ċultúr na hEorpaHe wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: When I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ga: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
result.orig: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
result.html: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramachWhen I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a tugaḋ mo roġa seomra dom san óstán d'ḟreagraíos go cúramaċWhen I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
